start-go.description: 启动 Go AI Gateway 服务

stop-go.description: 停止 Go AI Gateway 服务 (端口 8080)
stop-go.command: for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :8080 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /PID %a /F

restart-go.description: 重启 Go AI Gateway 服务
restart-go.command: for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :8080 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /PID %a /F & timeout /t 2 & cd go && go run ./cmd/server/main.go
